metadata.title: SSA Disability Program Statistics - SSDI and SSI Annual Data
metadata.description: Comprehensive Social Security Administration disability statistics compiled from the DI Annual Statistical Report 2023, SSI Annual Statistical Report 2023, OACT beneficiary statistics, and SSA Statistical Snapshot (November 2024).

sources.name: SSI Annual Statistical Report, 2023 - Section 2: SSI Recipients

notes: SSDI (DI) = Social Security Disability Insurance - earned benefit for workers who become disabled
SSI = Supplemental Security Income - needs-based program for aged, blind, and disabled individuals
Some individuals receive both SSDI and SSI concurrently
All counts are December totals unless otherwise noted
Benefit amounts are in nominal dollars (not inflation-adjusted)
(L) in original data means less than 0.05%

total_people_receiving_disability_benefi.note: All disabled under age 65, in thousands
